price: 16. El día en que les inflijamos un gran castigo (el día de la batalla de Badr) les daremos su merecido”.
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَبۡطِشُ ٱلۡبَطۡشَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: yawma nabṭishu al-baṭshata al-kub'rā innā muntaqimūna
